title: Hey!
content:
Hey!

What wrong with interspecies love?


I dated this lovely panda at our local zoo for three years. Nothing came from it, but we had a good time.

Honestly, some people can be so narrow minded!A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

title: Re: Hey!
content:
I honestly don't know whether to take it as a joke or as a real story. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]
Well, nothing is wrong with interspecies love, but I mean only in the sense of people taking good care of their pets etc.. But like getting married with an animal is a bit bizarre (in my opinion). Although dolphins are highly intelligent, it may be a bit different.. But still, I don't think different species should be that close.. Well, I'm narrow minded. title: fd
content:
She's right in that there are purer forms of love than the mere male-female sexual. If someone can love something they can't really have sex with so much that they'll marry it, I can only admire them.

On the other hand,

[quote]Quote:[hr]"He will still play with all the other girls there," she said, of their prenuptial agreement. "I hope he has a lot of baby dolphins with the other dolphins. The more dolphins the better."[hr][/quote]

Ugh...

title: Re: Don't ask how I know this, too.
content:
Well, there probably aren't many species that they couldn't abuse (or "love").. Both adult/grownup dolphin genders (at least Bottlenose Dolphins) have bigger genitals than humans do, which basically means that once they find dolphins it would be physically easy.. In a way. There can be problems with the fact that those animals live in water, are a lot stronger and bigger than humans. The male dolphin genitalia may cause severe damage/pain, kinda like in this case (a news article):
[url=http://www.news24.com/News24/World/News/0,,2-10-1462_1739698,00.html]www.news24.com/News24/Wor...98,00.html[/url]
It's about some man who was penetrated by a stallion, and "Basically, his colon was ruptured, along with his lower organs in that region, and he bled out". [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sick.gif[/img]

Relating to this dolphin subject, there even is a dolphin sex guide circling the net (without any pictures). That might be the LL's source of information, no idea. Never seen any live proofs about those acts, and not even wanting to. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-no.gif[/img] [PM me LL if you have any!] Not sure whether that is a hoax or not, although there has been stories in news sometimes about dolphins trying to mate with swimmers etc.. (Or that's what they obviously claimed.. Dolphins' fault.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] )

Ah, where would one get this kind of useful information without internet?

What are you looking at? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!
